Name: Medical Supplies
Description: The supply-starved camp is in desperate need of medical supplies…
QuestDesc: The supply-starved camp is in desperate need of medical supplies…

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We don't have anything on us that we can trade with outsiders for medicine. We need to think of an alternative.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tisdale
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How about going to Bjartr Woods for help? They won't turn us down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've been living out in the wilds for years. Cuts, bruises, and the usual sickness are nothing new to us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But there's no one in camp who can treat diseases, and we really don't want to go back to Bjartr Woods for help...

Dialogues.Speaker: Tisdale
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So we usually lend the Spacetrek Collective a hand with their research out in the tundra, including cooking meals for them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Tisdale
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In return, we get some supplies and medicine from them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But one of the boys in the camp fell and hurt his leg. He needs medicine, urgently...

Dialogues.Speaker: Tisdale
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This isn't the time to be acting tough. We're going to Bjartr Woods.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Medicine, huh? Some nutrient patches and energy blocks might be able to help them.)

Options.PlotLineKey: Hurry, take these to the injured boy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you! It might not really count as a proper thank-you gift, but I have something I want to give you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tisdale and I must tend to the boy. See you in a bit!
